_header: I am a fool I can no good
Subjects: love, feigned; love, vicissitudes of; transitoriness, of earthly love
_description: ‘Amor fatuus’ — eight lines, rhyming couplets and a quatrain, abab.

BLHar7322.First Lines: I am a fol i can no godho þat me louit hi halde him wod…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …I slou a wis king fair & strong& ȝit i ssal sle mo
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose inserted into Latin text, with Latin between lines of English.
